mapper.select: SELECT fUuid AS 'uuid', fProgramType AS 'programType', fTerminalType AS 'terminalType', fVersion AS 'version', fTargetVersion AS 'targetVersion', fStatus AS 'status', fMaxUpgradeCount AS 'maxUpgradeCount', fResidualUpgradeCount AS 'residualUpgradeCount', fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_client_upgrade

SELECT fUuid AS 'uuid', fTerminalType AS 'terminalType', fProgramType AS 'programType', fVersion AS 'version', fTargetVersion AS 'targetVersion', fStatus AS 'status', fMaxUpgradeCount AS 'maxUpgradeCount', fResidualUpgradeCount AS 'residualUpgradeCount', fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_client_upgrade WHERE fStatus = 1 AND fResidualUpgradeCount > 0
